rescuecore2.worldmodel

Interface WorldModel<T extends Entity>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The subclass of Entity that this world model holds.
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractWorldModel, DefaultWorldModel, StandardWorldModel

    public interface WorldModel<T extends Entity>
extends java.lang.Iterable<T>
    This class encapsulates everything about a world model. The world model can be parameterised on a subclass of Entity if required.

        Returns:

      • merge

        void merge(java.util.Collection<? extends Entity> toMerge)
        Merge a set of entities into this world. New entities will be added; existing entities will have properties replaced with those taken from the given objects. Any undefined properties in the given objects will NOT cause existing properties to become undefined. Note that this method is not parameterised by T.
        Parameters:
        toMerge - The set of entities to merge into this world model.

      • merge

        void merge(ChangeSet changeSet)
        Merge a set of changes into this world. If the ChangeSet specifies that a property has become undefined then the existing property WILL become undefined. This behaviour is different to the merge(Collection) method because an undefined value inside a ChangeSet means that the property value has become undefined, whereas in the other version of merge an undefined property means there is no value for that property.
        Parameters:
        changeSet - The set of changes to merge into this world model.
